content: the lea socks knitting pattern by deb buckingham classic simple that s how i describe the lea socks it s the kind of sock that leaves you wanting more it s easy to memorize easy project to take on-the-go and any tonal solid or variegated yarn would look lovely on her she s super fun to make the pattern equips you with detailed written instructions a stitch glossary and hours of knitting fun get yourself cozy with some yummy yarn a good netflix series and your favorite beverage have you seen ugly betty maybe inventing anna loved them so much all photos are the property of deb buckingham please use your own photos when posting your work 1 the lea socks knitting pattern by deb buckingham @knit on designs llc supply list us 1 2 25mm needles pattern was written with dpns in mind though magic loop or 9 circulars can be used note i work the pattern on 4 needles and knit with the 5th yarn fingering weight a homespun house soft sock - sock set walking on sunshine 367yds 80g total 75% sw merino/25% nylon i used the full skein for the mc and one mini for the cuff one for the heel and one for the toe three minis each approximately 10g included in this set notions stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving in ends and scissors gauge approximately 7-8 stitches per inch stitch abbreviations st - stitch k - knit p - purl co - cast on k2tog knit 2 stitches together p2tog - purl 2 stitches together ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches purlwise one at a time then knit together through the front loop sl - slip_stitch purlwise bor beginning of round cc - contrasting color can be any 10-20 mini or leftover sock yarn mc - master color note ~pattern is written for an adult size medium width average size foot i have included a chart below for knitting your perfect length approx shoe size u s 6-9 5 39-42 euro ~ each sock mc - approximately 19g/each sock used cc1 blue - approximately 3g/each sock used cc2 yellow - approximately 4g/each sock used cc3 pink - approximately 3g/each sock used your numbers may vary as the grams per mini didn t seem consistent ~ this pattern is multiples of 4 so feel free to cast on your favorite size keep in mind your heel sts will alter a bit 2 the lea socks knitting pattern by deb buckingham @knit on designs llc the lea socks knitting pattern instructions cuff with us 1 2 25mm needles and cc1 yarn co 64 sts and join for working in the round being careful not to twist your sts work *k1 p1 repeat from * for 1 5 or desired length leg pattern for leg and foot change to mc *k3 p1 work pattern until sock measure 3 from cast on edge or desired length heel flap change to cc2 worked over first 32 sts
